reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Kenia Protected Relief and Recovery Programme 200294 Resilience Protecting and Rebuilding Livelihoods in arid and semi-arid Areas
Kenia Protected Relief and Recovery Programme 200294 Schutz und Wiederherstellung von Lebensgrundlagen in Trocken- und Halbtrockengebieten

description.narrative: Strategic Objective 1 - Save lives and protect livelihoods in emergencies. Strategic Objective 2 - Support or restore food security and nutrition and establish or rebuild livelihoods in fragile settings and following emergencies. Strategic Objective 3 - Reduce risk and enable people, communities and countries to meet their own food and nutrition needs.

Strategisches Ziel 1 - Schutz von Leben und Lebensunterhalt in Notfällen. Strategische Objektive 2 - Unterstützung und Wiederherstellung der Ernährungssicherheit Strategische Objektive 3 - Reduzierung von Gefahrenptenzial und Sicherstellung des eigenständigen Lebensunterhalts von vulnerablen Gemeinden

Strategic Objective 3 - Reduce risk and enable people, communities and countries to meet their own food and nutrition needs.
